MANIPULATION DE DONNEES

LET, DIM
CONTROLE DU DEROULEMENT DE PROGRAMME

IF, FOR, WHILE, DO WHILE, GOSUB
ENTREES / SORTIES

PRINT, INPUT, KEYPRESSED, KEYRELEASED
FONCTIONS ARITHMETIQUES

<, >, =, ≤, ≥, <>
+, -, *, /, %, ^
AND, OR, NOT
FONCTIONS MATHEMATIQUES

EXP, INT, LN, LOG, RND, SQR, MIN, MAX, DTR, RTD, ABS, ATN, TAN, COS, SIN, GCD
FONCTIONS GRAPHIQUES

DRAWSQUARE, DRAWCIRCLE, DRAWTRIANGLE, DRAWRECTANGLE, DRAWLINE, DRAWTEXT, DRAWCLEAR, DRAWCLEARAREA, RGB
FONCTIONS AUDIO

PLAY
AUTRES

CONSTANTE, MAIN, LABEL, UPDATE, STR, STRCAT
EXEMPLES

PONG, SNAKE, FLAPPY BIRD
